ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration

Class I2C

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration.I2C

  • public class I2C
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions to write and read register values from i2c sensors
    Author:
    pschatzmann
